show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
MD’s over-prescribe tests if they make a profit from them. Could probiotics prevent deaths from swine flu as an... <!--more--> alternative to the flu shot?
Are we getting sick from our disinfected water by-products?
The US still lags in health quality improvements.
A government backed expert panel joins in the fight against skin cancer by pushing for a ban on tanning booths.
Caller #1: Harvey (SF) - The importance of alkalinity in our diet.
Caller puts spirulina in his water (no taste).
#2: Giselle (NY) -  Probiotic in a nasal spray not available yet.
Asked for water filter recommendation.

brubik@earthlink.
net Health Tips: #1 -Law suit for “fruit” snacks without the fruit.
Shame shame on General Mills #2 -Living your life backwards?!
